name: family-expense-tracker
description: A simple web app to track and categorize family expenses

scripts.build:firebase: npm run build:client && cd functions && npm run build
scripts.build:netlify: npm run install:client && npm run build:client && npm run build:netlify-functions
scripts.build:netlify-functions: cd netlify/functions && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:firebase: npm install && npm run install:client && npm run install:functions
scripts.install:netlify-all: npm install && npm run install:client && npm run install:netlify

author: Family Expense Tracker
